name: Dr Tijo Alex
details: Dr. Tijo Alex leads the clinic with over 16 years of experience in Orthodontics. His friendly and calm nature ensures that every dental appointment is a comfortable experience.

name: Dr Jijo Paul
details: Dr. Jijo Paul is an expert in dental implants, providing patients with permanent, natural-looking solutions for missing teeth.

name: Dr Lijo Issac
details: Dr. Lijo Issac specializes in crowns, bridges, and dentures, helping patients restore their smiles and improve oral function.

name: Dr Arun Babu, MDS
details: Dr. Arun Babu is skilled in complex oral surgeries, including extractions, corrective jaw procedures, and facial trauma care.

name: Dr Balaji R. Shenoy, MDS
details: Dr. Balaji R. Shenoy specializes in advanced oral and maxillofacial surgery, with expertise in corrective and reconstructive procedures.

name: Dr Athulya, MDS
details: Dr. Athulya is an endodontist focusing on painless root canal treatments to save natural teeth and preserve smiles.

name: Dr Jacob Mohan, MDS
details: Dr. Jacob Mohan provides expert gum care and periodontal treatments to ensure long-lasting oral health.

name: Dr Unni Mohan, MDS
details: Dr. Unni Mohan is dedicated to childrenâ€™s dental health, offering gentle and specialized care for young patients.

name: Dr Angelina Julie
details: Dr. Angelina Julie practices general dentistry, focusing on preventive and restorative treatments for patients of all ages.
